tasks.title: Implement quantum measurement collapse

tasks.title: Implement quantum annealing optimizer

Returns optimal solution and energy landscape metrics

notes: Quantum-inspired AGI is part of Constellation Framework (⚛️ Quantum star). Current implementation is stub. Full implementation requires quantum circuit simulation libraries (e.g., qiskit, cirq) or custom quantum-inspired algorithms. Consider using numpy for quantum state vectors.
